confidentiality.notes: Gardendale police Lt. Scott Banks said the investigation began when the daughter of a resident at the facility notided discrepancies in her mother's checking account. Investigators, led by Det. Jimmy Unangst, determined Davis was a suspect in other identity theft cases.  They obtained a search warrant for Davis' Center Point home, where Banks said they found notebooks that contained hundreds of entries, including names, dates of birth, and other personal information.

discovery_notes: Gardendale police Lt. Scott Banks said the investigation began when the daughter of a resident at the facility notided discrepancies in her mother's checking account. Investigators, led by Det. Jimmy Unangst, determined Davis was a suspect in other identity theft cases.
summary: Gardendale nursing home worker charged with identity theft - Magnolia Ridge Care and Rehabilitation Center - A Gardendale nursing home employee is under arrest after police say she stole the identities of hundreds of people, including eight at the facility where she worked; investigation began when the daughter of a resident at the facility notided discrepancies in her mother's checking account. Investigators, led by Det. Jimmy Unangst, determined Davis was a suspect in other identity theft cases.

victim.victim_id: Magnolia Ridge Care and Rehabilitation Center
